courseName: European Masters in Embedded Computing Systems MSc
facultyName: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
description: This European master’s in embedded computing systems (EMECS) is a 2 year course run in partnership with Kaiserslautern University in Germany and the Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU). We are experts in system-on-chip (SoC) and electronics, NTNU specialise in electronics and communications, and Kaiserslautern in embedded systems. You’ll learn the fundamentals of embedded computing systems and experience life and study in different countries.  Our MSc embedded systems degree is a European-based master’s. It allows you to study in 2 countries at different universities.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
